card.name: Pilot VRN
card.text: This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

card.name: Gear VRN
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Core VRN
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures a player controls attack you and aren’t blocked, that player seizes The Core. (This triggers after blockers are declared.) Whenever you seize The Core and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose one— • You get {E}. • Surveil 1.

card.name: Vryn Draft Archetypes VRN
card.text: RW REBEL INSPIRED GEARS Attack your opponent with inspired creatures and double up on your value by cracking some gears. WU SEIZE THE CORE Seize Vryn itself. Gain a steady stream of energy. And play tempo cards to level the playing field. UG ENGROSS FLASH Cast versatile spells during your opponents turn and disrupt them with counter-magic and spells with flash. GB LEAVE THE GRAVE Make your cards leave the graveyard and get reward for it. BR VEHICLE MAVERICKS Run over your opponent with Vehicles and use crewing creatures as cannon fodder. WB PHYREXIAN ENTER THE BATTLEFIELD Reanimate and flicker your creatures to bury your opponent under a pile of value. BU COVERT CONSORTIUM Hit your opponents with sneaky creatures to uncover your opponents doom. UR WIZARDS FROM EXILE Rebound is back. Combine it with impulse effects and other cast from exile synergies to show your spellcasting domination. RG ENERGIZED KICKER Accumulate energy and spend it to kick your spells into overdrive. GW TEACH ABILITIES Modify your creatures with ability counters. Attack with big creatures.

card.name: Spirit VRN
card.text: Decayed (This creature can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: The Core1 VRN
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures a player controls attack you and aren’t blocked, that player seizes The Core. (This triggers after blockers are declared.) Whenever you seize The Core and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose one— • You get {E}. • Surveil 1.

card.name: Wizard VRN
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast creature spells.

card.name: Treasure VRN
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.
